subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
The Joint programme, Harnessing Diversity for Sustainable Development and Social Change is developed with the aim to mobilize the culture sector and utilize culture to alleviate poverty, enhance social cohesion, and promote sustainable development in Ethiopia.  The project employs a participatory approach that engages men and women in in intercultural dialogue, in identifying tourism related enterprises and opportunities as well as assessing capacity building needs in community initiatives, in formulating small-scale income generating activities.  It has the following defined results
-  Harnessing the potential of cultural and creative industries, particularly heritage based activities such as handicraft and cultural tourism for income generation, economic development, and poverty alleviation.
  -  Enhancement of indigenous knowledge and practices of natural heritage management as well as strengthening the link between nature and culture based sustainable development.
  -  Enhancing cross cutting capacity at the federal and regional level.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Harnessing Diversity:MDG-Cultu
